Attilio,
What is it exactly that you require f=
rom I18N enabled testing
environment?

What we have done with Junit is to c=
hange Locales and tested if strings
and dates etc. of our presentation laye=
r objects come out correctly.
This is straightforward. What else would you =
like to do regarding I18N?

Johannes
